comment._content: Chief Engineer of the New York subways www.nycsubway.org/wiki/Chapter_02._Organization_and_Perso... see also: ALFRED CRAVEN, THE GOETHALS OF THE NEW SUBWAYS; Quiet, Competent, the Chief Engineer of the $325,000,000 Work Now in Progress Is a Man Who for Years Has Been Directing Gigantic Burrowings of the Earth. (The New York Times, February 1, 1914) query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?res=F10D1FFF355D13... In 1915 he was named to a new Naval Advisory Board, together with Robert S. Woodward and Thomas Robins the Washington times, September 13, 1915, HOME EDITION, Page 3 chroniclingamerica.loc.gov/lccn/sn84026749/1915-09-13/ed-...
